name: Fortress Fighter
description:
A game made as part of JimJam.  This was produced in 41/50 hours (7 hours sleep, 2 hours other stuff). Game made in unreal Engine 4.

Free assets were used in the making of this which mostly comes from the Unreal Engine Learn Section. I hope to develop this game further into the future but for now I hope you like what I have produced! 

Tips:

  • Move backward before being attacked to avoid taking as much damage
  • Move around and don't let the enemies build up or you will be overwhelmed
  • You can run away from enemies. And they will eventually stop chasing you.
  • You don't have to kill all enemies.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Known Bugs:

- Mouse cursor doesn't appear in UI (Appeared before Compilation)

- Tree Textures Missing (Appeared before Compilation) 

- Restart button doesn't work. I tried to grey it out compared to the quit game button but should have greyed it out more. You'll just have to exit and restart.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Controls: 

Typical FPS Controls:

[W][S][A][D] - Move

[Left Click] - Attack

[Mouse] - Look

[Shift] - Sprint

[Spacebar]- Jump

[Ctrl] - Crouch

[Esc] - Pause

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Reccomended specs: 

CPU: Intel i3 or better

GPU: GTX 780 or Better

RAM: 8GB
